name: Django-With-React
description: 1. Install Python Virtual Environment    ```    $ pip install pipenv    ``` 2. Launch Python Virtual Environment    ```    $ pipenv shell    ``` 3. Install dependencies    ```    $ pipenv install django djangorestframework django-rest-knox    ``` 4. Create Django Projects    ```    $ django-admin startproject <name>    $ cd ./<name>    ``` 5. Create Django App    ```    $ python manage.py startapp <app_name>    ```    ```    Add <app_name> and 'rest-framework' to settings.py    ```    ```    Create Database in models.py with
